tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_encryption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensitive_data VARCHAR(255) ENCRYPTED,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(50) ENCRYPTED,
    encryption_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensitive_data (
  id SERIAL,
  data VARCHAR(255),
  encrypted_data VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE encryption_logs (
  log_id SERIAL,
  data_id INT,
  encryption_status VARCHAR(50),
  encryption_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES sensitive_data(id)
);
